thread.title: Savannah-Chatham police investigating Monday night bicycle accident
thread.title_full: Savannah-Chatham police investigating Monday night bicycle accident | savannahnow.com

author: Savannah Morning News
title: Savannah-Chatham police investigating Monday night bicycle accident
text:
By Savannah Morning News The Savannah-Chatham Metropolitan Police Department’s Major Accident Investigation Team is investigating a wreck on Savannah’s southside involving a truck and bicycle.
The accident occurred on Eisenhower Drive at approximately 10 p.m. on Monday, said police spokeswoman Michelle Gavin.
Robert L. Brown, 60, of Savannah attempted to ride his bicycle northbound across Eisenhower Drive near Sallie Mood Drive. He rode out in front of an oncoming Ford Ranger and was struck.
Brown was transported to the hospital in critical condition. The investigation is ongoing.
